name: Last Harvest (Split82)
description:
Everyone you know and love has perished, the world has become nothing but ash and dust, the ice caps have melted, the animals are long gone. The only thing that’s kept you going is your sheer passion for harvesting the fruit of every last tree.

Goal: Get as high as you can without falling off or letting the water touch you!

Originally created for Ludum Dare 52.

Code, Graphics: Split

Music & SFX: Freeek
